comments.body: can we just do `case c: Cast => UnresolvedAlias(c, Some(Column.generateAlias))`?

Seems we can't. This code will strip the `attribute` which is below the `Cast` so I leave it.

A example, with the code, `spark.range(1).selectExpr("CAST(CAST(id as int) as double)").columns` will return the `c1` instead of `CAST(CAST(c1 as INT) as DOUBLE)`.
